tool_description: Validates app metadata fields for completeness, character limits, and platform-specific requirements for both iOS and Android submissions.

app_name.description: The name of the app as it will appear in stores

app_description.description: Full description of the app functionality

error_messages: Invalid app name: App name must be 1-50 characters and contain no prohibited symbols.
Description too long: iOS descriptions limited to 4000 characters, Android to 4000 characters.
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' are supported platforms.
Invalid category: Category must match platform-specific category guidelines.
Keyword limit exceeded: iOS allows up to 100 characters of keywords, Android has different limits.
usage: Provide app_name, app_description, target_platforms, and category. Optionally include keywords array. Tool validates against platform-specific requirements and character limits.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or warning

issues_found.description: List of validation issues that need resolution

recommendations.description: Suggested improvements for better store visibility
